text: Gary Owens (May 10, 1934 â€“ February 12, 2015) was an American disc jockey and voice actor. He is known for his roles in Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In, The Gong Show, Dynomutt, Dog Wonder, Midnight Cowboy, and in Roger Ramjet. Owens was born in Mitchell, South Dakota.Gary Owens Biography (1934-) Owens died February 12, 2015, from complications due to type 1 diabetes, a condition he had experienced since childhood. ==References== ==Other websites== * Comprehensive Gary Owens interview with Kliph Nesteroff * Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:American television personalities Category:American radio personalities Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Musicians from South Dakota Category:Actors from South Dakota Category:Comedians from South Dakota
title: Gary Owens
